tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserPermissions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    role_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    access_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
  user_id INT,
  permission_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, permission_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES permissions(permission_id)
);
